Our history

40 YEARS OF EXPERTISE

In the beginning, around 1978, Minco Tech started off as an interest in a family business. It started with measuring and supplying pipes to the mining industry. As innovation became available, the business moved into cyclone research and development. Minco Techâ€™s investment in cyclone research and development has built on the work the Dutch invented in the 1950s.

A solid base from which to grow.

Today, we are a family business with inherent vales of trust, honesty and integrity, running through our veins.

We are long-time active members of the Australian Coal Preparation Society and regularly attend technical training and networking events to stay abreast of the industry.

Every day we are developing solutions to help our customers face challenges. Quality, price and customer service are inherent but for us, itâ€™s the long-term relationships that are most important. The size of your order doesn't matterâ€”we treat everyone with respect and dignity.
